text: Excellent DjVu viewer with dark mode support!
It works well. Thanks to the developer of this extension
With this extension I can see the file online, but when I try to download it, it downloads an 1 kB file that is not working. In addition I cannot convert the file to pdf.

It won't open local files when I click "open with Google Chrome". Also, it doesn't use the native scrollbar attached to the HTML body, so when searching it doesn't show the yellow lines in the scrollbar indicating the matches.

Even if i'm not using the extension
It's using my gpu memory for some reason.

http://prntscr.com/kwrc9b

It's possible it has a miner inside
